title: Aarya Antique Gold Haaram with Kundan and Gemstone Peacock Pendant
materials: Emerald Cabochon. Features exquisite Hyderabadi polish for a rich
antique finish. Chain weight is approximately 48.82 grams.
features: This stunning Haaram showcases intricate filigree work accented with Polki Kundan diamonds, creating a regal and timeless aesthetic. The central pendant features a graceful peacock motif, meticulously crafted within a circular frame and adorned with more Kundan stones. Delicate gold beads dangle gracefully, adding movement and sparkle. The necklace features peacock details and floral accents along the neck piece.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. A statement piece perfect for the modern bride seeking a touch of heritage.
description: This Haaram is a testament to South Indian artistry, blending traditional motifs with high-quality materials. The antique gold finish adds a vintage charm, while the Kundan diamonds offer unmatched brilliance. The peacock pendant symbolizes beauty and prosperity, making it a meaningful and cherished heirloom. Its durable construction ensures lasting beauty for generations.
